answers.answer: I was due October 8 and my son was born September 12.. :) I had preeclampsia and got a c section. Good luck and congratulations!
Thank you & congratulations on your bundle of joy :) i'm having mine normal but the pains are horrible baby #2 :)

question: I'm due October 8th but my little princess is coming early to meet her parents i'm really excited but in pain but it's worth it my water just broke so wish me luck and prayers please thank you good luck October mummies :) :)
title: 38 weeks 2 days my baby girl is almost here :)
